results.title: Animal Crackers
results.brief_description: This is one of the Marx Brothers’ funniest films, with Groucho starring as the big, wild, game hunter causing more delirium in high society than in the jungle! A painting is stolen in a high society home, and the Marx Brothers are there to lend their confusing hand to solve the crime.

results.title: Angela's ashes [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Paramount Pictures, Allan Parker, David Brown and Scott Rudin
results.brief_description: After immigrating to America, young Frank and his family move back to Limerick following the death of his infant sister. The family is forced to live in the slums of Ireland, with conditions being much worse than they were in America. His Northern Irish father, Malachy, has difficulty finding work because of his former loyalty to the IRA, and what little money he earns, he drinks away, leaving Frank, his mother Angela, and his young brother to scrounge for coal and beg for food and clothing. Determined to escape the poverty, illness, and death that surrounds him in Ireland, Frank dreams of returning to America. Cast includes Emily Watson and Robert Carlyle. Based on the Pulitzer Prize winning autobiography by Frank McCourt.

results.title: Angel on my shoulder
results.creator_credit: Charles R. Rogers and Archie Mayo
results.brief_description: Film Noir classic wherein the devil promises leniency to a dead gangster if he will return to earth and take over the body of a judge who is stamping out evil. Stars Claude Rains, Paul Muni and Anne Baxter.

results.title: Angel of vengeance = Ms.45
results.creator_credit: Rochelle Films, Navaron Films and Abel Ferrara
results.brief_description: Abel Ferrara’s (‘Bad Lieutenant’, ‘King of New York’, ‘Driller Killer’) foray into the revenge fantasy genre is an often unnerving film which owes a lot to Roman Polanski’s disturbing tale of sexual terror, ‘Repulsion’. Set in the rough garment district of New York, ‘Angel of Vengeance’ follows the gradual descent into madness of Thana (Zoe Tamerlis), a mute seamstress who snaps after she is raped twice in one day. Her reaction to it plays like a strange form of liberation, as the once timid seamstress proceeds to off some of the more sleazier male citizens of New York city. Ferrara sprinkles this unusual and stylish low budget film with dark comic moments, eccentric characters (like Thana’s weird landlady played by Editta Sherman), and its slow motion climax is a beautiful and surreal piece of filmmaking. Cast includes Albert Sinkys, Darlene Stuto, Helen McGara, Nike Zachmanoglou.

results.title: Angel baby
results.creator_credit: Timothy White, Michael Rymer, Meridian Films, Stamen and Jonathan Shteinman
results.brief_description: A funny, haunting love story, this film tells the story of two lost souls, Harry and Kate who fall in love against the odds and find the hope and strength in each other to accomplish the impossible. Jacqueline McKenzie and John Lynch star as two people with psychological problems who must also overcome many obstacles on the path to happiness, not the least of which is the pre-conceived notions of other people. Full of humour, compassion and hope this is a testament to the power of love; a roller coaster journey to the magical fringes of the human psyche.

results.title: Andrei Rublev
results.brief_description: Widely regarded as Tarkovsky’s finest film, this film charts the life of the great icon painter through a turbulent period of 15th Century Russian history, a period marked by endless fighting between rival Princes and by Tartar invasions. Made on an epic scale, it does not flinch from portraying the savagery of the time, from which, almost inexplicably, the serenity of Rublev’s art arose. The great set-pieces - the sack of Vladimir, the casting of the bell, the pagan ceremonies of St. John’s Night and the Russian crucifixion are tours-de-force of visceral film making. This is the most complete version of the film available and reported to be the director’s cut. In Russian with English subtitles.

results.title: Andre
results.creator_credit: Kushner-Locke Production, Adam Shapiro, Annette Handley and George Miller
results.brief_description: Andre, an adorable seal is orphaned when his mother is caught in a fishing net. The harbour master, his wife and three children adopt the lovable pup and nurse him back to health. Andre forms a special relationship with seven year-old tomboy Toni and the two prove that true friendship can survive the toughest trials.

results.title: And your mother too! = Y tu mama tambien
results.creator_credit: Besame Mucho Picures, Good Machine, Producciones Anhelo and Alfonso Cuaron
results.brief_description: Alfonso Cuaron shocked and delighted audiences with his third feature, a return to his native Mexico and a return to form. Principally this is the story of two horny teenagers who take a road trip with an older woman in search of a mythical beach. But Cuaron makes his film much more than just “‘American Pie’ in Spanish” (as it is was crudely dubbed in some reviews), creating a clever, funny and provocative work that comments on the irascible nature of teenage friendship and the class delineations of Mexican society whilst retaining scintillating repartee between the leads (Diego Luna and Gael Garcia Bernal riff off each other in a delightfully tangential fashion) and by being downright sexy.

results.title: And then there were none = Ten little indians
results.creator_credit: Popular Pictures, Harry M Popkin and Rene Clair
results.brief_description: Ten strangers, each with a criminal past, are invited to attend a party on desolate island off the English coast at the request of a mysterious host, Mr Owen. As the group settle into their sojourn, it gradually dawns on them that they have been gathered on the island to be murdered, one by one, as penance for their crimes. It seems that guests are being murdered according the nursery rhyme, “Ten little Indians”, but even knowing what murder is coming next can’t prevent it- the surviving Indians must find the mysterious Mr Owen, masquerading as one of the guests, to stop the deadly cat and mouse game. Cast includes Walter Huston, Louise Hayward, Roland Young and Judith Anderson. Based on the novel by Agatha Christie.

results.title: And the band played on
results.creator_credit: Odyssey, Home Box Office, Midge Sanford, Sarah Pillsbury and Roger Spottiswoode
results.brief_description: Based on Randy Shilts best-selling book which was drawn from a true story. The film exposes how the inaction and in-fighting amongst Government officials, blood banks, the scientific community and the general public contributed to the spreading of Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome and the general ignorance about the disease. The film will evoke anger and shock, but is ultimately moving. Starring Matthew Modine and an all-star cast of Alan Alda, Phil Collins, Richard Gere, Anjelica Huston, Steve Martin, Ian McKellen and Lily Tomlin.
